name: Taking Breaks
details: It is important to take short breaks during a study session as it allows the brain to retain information better. While taking breaks focus on doing something active and different.

name: Concentration
details: To improve concentration use should: minimise distractions, write a to do list and schedule specific study times to help

name: Organising Workload
details: To help with studying you should organise your workload accordingly to what must be done first to what is least important. Writing a list of when things are need to be done and when it's due is also a good way in organising workload
